data.text: Yaxuba bɔnsɔɛ naxan findixi Isirayila ra,
e sabati Yudaya Ala xa hɔrɔmɔlingira luxi dɛnnaxɛ.
Xulunyumi baa to Isirayila ɲama to,
Isirayila geyae to e to, e naxa tugan tugan ɲɛlɛxinyi ra,
Munse a niyaxi na baa xa rabi mafuren?
Munse a niyaxi Isirayila geyae xa ɲɛlɛxin
Duniɲa birin xa sɛrɛn Marigi ya ra,
naxan ye dulonyi ramini fanye xɔrɔxɔɛ kui.
